description: Front Garden - Front Boundary G1 - 3x Birch Reduce length of all branches by up to 1 - 1.5 metres ensuring natural shape and balance typical of species is maintained where possible. The tree are located along the front boundary. Reduction as part of a maintenance program to maintain the trees at a suitable size for their location. To reduce the conflict with the BT phone lines. To retain suitable light levels in the area Front Garden - Front Of House T2 - Viburnum Species Reduce length of all branches by up to 0.5 metres ensuring natural shape and balance typical of species is maintained where possible. Thin by removal of young stems. Remove horizontal branches retaining vertical branches. The mature shrub is located in the middle of the driveway. Reduction as part of a maintenance program to maintain the Shrub at a suitable size for its location. To reduce the extent of encroachment over the driveway area. To allow for more suitable access in to the driveway area Front Garden - Right Hand Side In Neighbours Garden T3 - Cherry Reduce back to 1 x limb overhanging garden of No.3 to growth point above Boundary Line. Prune to clear BT Pole. These are all located in the rear garden of No2 Western Lane adjacent to the boundary line of No3. Reduction back from the property of No2 Western Lane to reduce the extent of the encroachment. To reduce the conflict with the BT pole. To allow more suitable light levels in to the area.
